me.taylorkelly.mywarp.limits

Class SimpleLimitManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.taylorkelly.mywarp.limits.SimpleLimitManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LimitManager

    public class SimpleLimitManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements LimitManager
    Manages Limits.

    The SimpleLimitManager operates on a LimitProvider that provides the actual limits and a WarpManager that holds the warps the limits apply on.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface me.taylorkelly.mywarp.limits.LimitManager

        LimitManager.EvaluationResult

    • Method Detail

      • evaluateLimit

        public LimitManager.EvaluationResult evaluateLimit(LocalPlayer creator,
                                                   LocalWorld world,
                                                   Limit.Type type,
                                                   boolean evaluateParents)
        Description copied from interface: LimitManager
        Evaluates whether the given creator exceeds limits on the given LocalWorld, testing against the given Limit.Type.
        Specified by:
        evaluateLimit in interface LimitManager
        Parameters:
        creator - the creator
        world - the LocalWorld
        type - the Limit.Type
        evaluateParents - Whether parents of the given type will be evaluated too (recursively). This is useful if not just a specific Limit.Type might be exceeded, but also a more general limit that includes the given one
        Returns:
        an EvaluationResult representing the result of the evaluation

      • getWarpsPerLimit

        public java.util.Map<Limit,java.util.List<Warp>> getWarpsPerLimit(LocalPlayer creator)
        Description copied from interface: LimitManager
        Gets all warps created by the given LocalPlayer mapped under the applicable Limit. The map is guaranteed to include all limits that effect the given player. If no warp exists for a certain limit, get(Limit) will return an empty list.
        Specified by:
        getWarpsPerLimit in interface LimitManager
        Parameters:
        creator - the creator
        Returns:
        a Map with all matching warps
